text: Baron Louis Gerard De Geer of Finsp√•ng, born 18 July 1818, dead 24 September 1896, was a Swedish statesman and writer. Between 1876 and 1880, he was the first Prime Minister of Sweden == References == Category:1818 births Category:1896 deaths Category:Government ministers of Sweden Category:Prime ministers of Sweden Category:Swedish nobility Category:Swedish writers
title: Louis Gerard De Geer
